name: The Assembling Hero
description:
For the 1º UNIVALI + Xamk Game Jam, I  present you this:

The Assembling Hero

The town is in danger,  and the giant robot who is supposed to protected it  got it's  parts scattered everywhere.

Now you must find the missing parts being careful not to destroy the town while doing so.

CREDITS - 

Game Director - Pedro Machado

Game Producer - Pedro Machado

Game Designer - Pedro Machado

2D Artist - Pedro Machado

Sound Designer - Pedro Machado

Programmer - Pedro Machado

Writer - Pedro Machado

It`s not even the concept of a game, and I`m definitly not proud of it.

For next time, I`m gonna work harder and be able do make something  that I actually want to say as mine.

P.S.: Try to enjoy the music I made, because it's the only thing that works in this project

But I'm proud of  the work I did on helping to organize the event and also from what I learned through it.
